titleInfo.title: United States of America v. Gaines et al
titleInfo.subTitle: Judgment as to James R. Chapman (3). Count 1, Dismissed upon motion of the government; Count 2, Defendant is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 70 months. Upon release from impisonment, the defendant shall be placed on supervised release for a term of 3 years, with standard/special conditions. $100 special assessment.Signed by Judge Solomon Oliver, Jr on 1/18/2008. (D,M)

titleInfo.title: United States of America v. Gaines et al
titleInfo.subTitle: Judgment as to Leroy S. Gaines, Jr. (1). Signed by Judge Solomon Oliver, Jr on 1/18/2008. (D,M)
